Note by the Secretary,The attached list of Cabinet Committees should be substituted for that circulated in March last (C0P0 71(58))., The composition of certain Committees has been modified, by direction of the Prime Minister, as a consequence of the recent Ministerial changes,(Signed) M.P-VA, HANKEY,,Secretary to the Cabinet,2, Whitehall Gardens, S.W.I. 24t.h May, 1938^ page 1 COMMITTEE OF HOME AFFAIRS.2 SUPPLY AND TRANSPORT COMMITTEE.3 IRISH SITUATION COMMITTEE.4 COMMITTEE ON THE REPORTS OF THE COMMISSIONERS FOR THESPECIAL AREAS.5 COMMITTEE ON THE ORGANISATION OF THE COAL-MININGINDUSTRY.6 COMMITTEE ON TRADE AND AGRICULTURE.7 COMMITTEE ON FOREIGN POLICY.8 COMMITTEE ON THE PROTECTION OF BRITISH SHIPPING (SPAIN).9 COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURAL POLICY.10 COMMITTEE ON OVERSEAS BROADCASTING.11 COMMITTEE ON BRITISH SHIPPING IN THE FAR EAST.12 COMMITTEE ON PUBLIC CAPITAL EXPENDITURE.
